description: Signals that an entity has validated its intent to move in a specific direction from its current location.

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity attempting to move.

targetLocationId.description: The unique identifier of the location entity the entity intends to move to.

direction.description: The direction the entity attempted to move (e.g., 'north', 'south').

previousLocationId.description: The unique identifier of the location entity the entity is currently in.

blockerEntityId.description: Optional. The unique identifier of an entity that might block this connection (e.g., a door), if specified in the connection data.
